channel.title: One mans dream
channel.description:
Ok, i'm sure that many people have heard about the man that traded a paper clip for a house through a series of trades increassing in value, well i am going to repeat this on runescape, i will start off with 1 diamond. All trades will take out on your world and your place on a non-member server. I am not doing this because i am poor, neither because i'm greedy, i am just doing it to see if it can be acomplished. I will check this post every night.
Object Supplied by Value Diamond Me >1k Full Addy Non-Forum Person 30k? Rune 2h Non-Forum Person 60k?
I have no target, i just want to know how much interest i will get.

item.title: One mans dream
item.dc:creator: @splidstarb splidstarb
item.description:
@splidstarb wrote:

stop bitchin’ about me and get on with the topic sheeeeeeeeeeeeeesh, no sense of humour i tells ya![br][size=1]Posted at: August 05, 2006, 04:45:37 PM[/size][hr]splid don’t chuuuuum…anyhoo, back to the trade, who would like to trade something for a rune 2h?

Read full topic

item.title: One mans dream
item.dc:creator: @Splid Splid
item.description:
@Splid wrote:

[quote=“Pyro, post:16, topic:6296”][quote author=Andrew link=topic=8600.msg115953#msg115953 date=1154524031]

i will give u full mith meet me in varrock wst bnk top floor on sunday @ bout 3 k? :D[br][size=1]Posted at: July 26, 2006, 03:58:49 PM[/size][hr]mi username is fiighterdude330 wrld 48 yh?

If your smart you’ll take that username outta that post…
[/quote]

Why? Is takign part in this against the rules? He isnt cheating is he?[/quote]

The thing is that you can have a max of 12 letters in ur username on runescape, that very stupid person used 15

Read full topic
